Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
print\(f''Total positions: {len\(data\)}''\)
print\(\)
print\(''Positions by ticker:''\)
from collections import defaultdict
by_ticker = defaultdict\(list\)
for p in data:
    by_ticker[p[''ticker'']].append\(p\)
for ticker, positions in sorted\(by_ticker.items\(\)\):
    total_qty = sum\(p[''quantity''] for p in positions\)
    total_cost = sum\(p[''quantity''] * p[''avgCost''] for p in positions\)
    print\(f''  {ticker}: {len\(positions\)} position\(s\), {total_qty} shares, $total_cost:.2f avg cost''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
for ticker, info in data[''prices''].items\(\):
    print\(f''{ticker}: {info[""price""]} {info[""currency""]}''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
aapl = [p for p in data if p[''ticker''] == ''AAPL''][-1]
if aapl:
    print\(f''AAPL position created: {aapl[""quantity""]} shares @ $aapl[\\""avgCost\\""]''\)
else:
    print\(''AAPL not found''\)
print\(f''Total positions: {len\(data\)}''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
result = data.get\(''chart'', {}\).get\(''result'', []\)
if result:
    meta = result[0].get\(''meta'', {}\)
    print\(''Meta keys:'', list\(meta.keys\(\)\)\)
    print\(''regularPrice:'', meta.get\(''regularPrice''\)\)
    print\(''regularMarketPrice:'', meta.get\(''regularMarketPrice''\)\)
    print\(''previousClose:'', meta.get\(''previousClose''\)\)
    print\(''chartPreviousClose:'', meta.get\(''chartPreviousClose''\)\)
    
    indicators = result[0].get\(''indicators'', {}\)
    if indicators:
        quote = indicators.get\(''quote'', [{}]\)[0]
        closes = quote.get\(''close'', []\)
        print\(''Close prices:'', closes[:5] if closes else ''None''\)
else:
    print\(''No result found''\)
")

if result:
    meta = result[0].get\(''meta'', {}\)
    print\(''Symbol:'', meta.get\(''symbol''\)\)

")

Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
tsla_positions = [p for p in data if p[''ticker''] == ''TSLA'']
print\(''TSLA positions:''\)
for p in tsla_positions:
    print\(f""  Account: {p[''account''][''name'']}, Currency: {p[''account''][''currency'']}""\)
    print\(f""  Quantity: {p[''quantity'']}, Avg Cost: {p[''avgCost'']}, Market: {p[''market'']}""\)
")
